name: Swords of Edo Visual Novel Game
blurb: A classic Bishoujo style visual novel game featuring Asumi as she investigates an academy linked to terrorism within Edo.

rewards.reward: Karmic Thanks ============================== You can rest easy knowing that you have helped fund this game and receive a little karmic boost from the universe.
The game itself ============================== Get one copy of Swords of Edo the Visual Novel as a Digital Download.
The Beta Package ============================= At this level you will receive a copy of the final game and early access to the game online by joining our final closed beta testing session.

An Early Bird Digital Bundle ============================== This special reward level is only available to the first people to pledge to help the campaign succeed and includes a copy of the game, beta and alpha access as well as an exclusive copy of the final soundtrack with the game. Finally backers at this level will also receive immediate access to our first game 'Quantum Flux' currently in the final phase of development.

Game & Graphic Novel ============================== At this reward level you will receive a copy of the game when it is completed as well as a digital copy of volume 1 of the Swords of Edo graphic novel when it is full revised and finalised.
The standard Digital Bundle ============================== This reward level includes a digital copy of the game, beta access and a copy of the final soundtrack with the game.

Edo Tshirt ============================== In addition to all the Beta package items and digital deliverables we will send you the Edo Tshirt in small, medium, large or extra large. Which you can choose at the conclusion of the campaign.
The Alpha Level Digital Bundle ============================== This reward level includes a copy of the game, beta and ALPHA access as well as an exclusive copy of the final soundtrack with the game.

Early Bird Physical Bundle ============================== At this level you will receive all of the rewards of the early bird digital bundle including the soundtrack and quantum flux access. Plus you will also receive an exclusive physical DVD edition of the game by post once it is fully completed.

Physicality ============================== At this level in addition to all the Alpha level goodies you will also have your choice of receiving either a set of postcards with a T-shirt of Edo, a larger print from the print series or an iPhone Case, all of which will be sent out at the end of the campaign.

Physical Bundle ============================== At this level you will receive all of the rewards of the early bird digital bundle including the soundtrack and quantum flux access. Plus you will also receive an exclusive physical DVD edition of the game by post once it is fully completed.

Early Bird Epic Physical Bundle ============================== At this level you will receive all of the rewards of the early bird physical bundle including the physical DVD edition. plus you will also receive a softcover colour edition of the swords of edo graphic novel and a t-shirt. Both the cd cover and graphic novel will be signed.

Early Bird Epic Hardcover Bundle ============================== At this level you will receive all of the rewards of the early bird physical bundle including the physical DVD edition. Plus you will also receive a Hardcover color edition of the swords of edo graphic novel and a t-shirt. Both the cd cover and graphic novel will be signed.

Major Character ============================== Have yourself included as a student/Disciple/Teacher character in the game as an NPC who will actually interact with Asumi and possibly other characters in the game. There are many times when characters interact with random NPCs and this is your chance to be one of those NPCs. This character can be based on you, a loved one or even a character of your own - I will contact you for details regarding what you would like and where i think i'd fit you in. It will be like having a walk-on part in the game with dialogue. You can choose which group you'd like to be a part of - Academy Teachers, a student, or a disciple of the terrorists etc. Obviously, your selection will be limited to what works within the story scenarios, but hopefully i can put you someplace you will find entertaining. This will also include sending you any rough sketches of what your character will look like.  In addition to these rewards you will also receive the Early Bird Epic Hardcover Bundle rewards as well as the digital wallpaper add-ons.

Male Protagonist ============================== Have yourself included as a new major character within the Swords of Edo Visual Novel Game. Your male character can be based on you, a friend or a description of your choice. They will then be incorporated into the game as another major character that Asumi will interact with. In addition to these rewards you will also receive the Early Bird Epic Physical Bundle rewards as well as volume 1 and the digital wallpaper add-ons.

Super Epic Design Reward ============================== At this level not only will you be able to design a new character to appear in the game (male or female) but you will also be able to decide some fun ecchi scenes for the character and give ideas on ecchi wallpapers to be included with the game. In addition your character will become a major role within the game. You will also receive all add-ons alongside the Epic Hardcover Bundle rewards. Your character will feature in any future DLC story-lines we create for the Swords of Edo campaign. Last but not least your character will also appear as a character in the Volume 2 of Swords of Edo graphic novel.
